alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 3:33AM MST until December 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow, winds gusts over 50 mph, and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. * WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel to Cooke City will be difficult to impossible at times. Outdoor recreation activities will be dangerous with near whiteout conditions, significant blowing and drifting snow, and increased avalanche danger.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
